name: Onmyoji:The Card Game MOD
description:
这是一个用爱发电的阴阳师：百闻牌MOD，你将扮演百闻牌中的看板小猫三目使用80+张卡牌和多种新机制和新遗物，与16+位登船式神一起勇闯尖塔。
创意和素材大部分源自百闻牌官方，有魔改之处请原作粉丝轻喷。
作者邮箱：846260131@qq.com。
 ---------------------------------------------------- 
This is a fan-made Onmyoji:The Card Game Mod for Slay the spire. You will play as an cute character in Onmyoji:TCG, Cat Three Eyes, using over 80 cards and various new mechanisms and artifacts, and most importantly, with 16+boarding Shikigamis to bravely conquer the spire. 
Most of the creativity and materials are origniated from the official TCG. If there are any annoying issue or copy right issue, feel free to contact me. 
Author email: 846260131@qq.com
